topic: Adaptive Quizzes 101: Item Response Theory in Plain Language
target_audience: assessment teams exploring CAT and adaptive practice

refs.ref_string: International Handbook of Computerized Adaptive Testing (2010)
refs.content: Open handbook covering item calibration, ability estimation (MLE/EAP), and item selection algorithms.
Foundational text: 1PL/2PL/3PL models, item parameters (a, b, c) and information functions.
CAT overview: efficiency, precision, content constraints; practical considerations for operational testing.

special_instructions: Explain minimal pipeline: calibrate→bank→constraints→engine. Include small numeric example of item information and stopping rules.
